price: Na monhwε na moankͻyε sε wͻn a wͻn werε afri Nyankopͻn na enti Ɔmaa wͻn werε frii wͻn ara wͻn ho no. Saa nkorͻfoͻ no ne abͻnefoͻ no.
arabic: وَلَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ نَسُواْ ٱللَّهَ فَأَنسَىٰهُمۡ أَنفُسَهُمۡۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walā takūnū ka-alladhīna nasū al-laha fa-ansāhum anfusahum ulāika humu al-fāsiqūna
